pullRequest.body:
Two lemmas about indicators ([limsup_eq_tendsto_sum_indicator_nat_atTop](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Topology/Algebra/Order/LiminfLimsup.html#limsup_eq_tendsto_sum_indicator_nat_atTop), [limsup_eq_tendsto_sum_indicator_atTop](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Topology/Algebra/Order/LiminfLimsup.html#limsup_eq_tendsto_sum_indicator_atTop)) are moved from `Mathlib.Topology.Algebra.Order.LiminfLimsup` to `Mathlib.Probability.Martingale.BorelCantelli`. I'm not completely sure this is the right place for them, but it simplifies significantly the imports and these lemmas weren't used anywhere else, so...

Their proofs are also significantly simplified. There is a new lemma `Set.infinite_iff_tendsto_sum_indicator_atTop` which seems more versatile and concentrates most of the difficulty, `limsup_eq_tendsto_sum_indicator_nat_atTop` is removed (it is less general than the third result), and `limsup_eq_tendsto_sum_indicator_atTop` is deduced very quickly from `Set.infinite_iff_tendsto_sum_indicator_atTop`.

---
